review: It is awesome. I reccomend highly.
author: Shawn P Brgan

review: I love the fact that the fire tv stick does so many things and there are so many apps to choose from.
author: William Winchester

review: I do not know how we lived without it.  Has replaced our Chromecast as the go to streaming device.
author: Jeff B

review: nice but had to get new router for speed
author: David Smythe

review: Disappointed that HBO to go can't be played on it.
author: William Toth

review: Works great!... Was nice being able to watch Netflix and Amazon instant videos on my tv... Picture was great and it was really easy to install!!!....can't believe its just $40!
author: Peta "PetaS"

review: Fire Stick could not successfully log into my unprotected WiFi.  It worked fine for two others, but not for me.  I returned it.
author: Mark Haskoe

review: The device took longer than expected for delivery but when it arrive it was all configured for my Prime account. It is easy to setup and use. Video quality is very good. At times it does seem to reboot often. I wish there was more free Prime content. All in all it is well worth the $35 cost.
author: Douglas R. Skinner "Chris Fan"
